main event: A sighting of a descending object with silvery colors and yellow and green colors at the top observed in North Platte, Nebraska on 18 January 1956.
interesting points: The object had rods sticking out and produced no sound,The sighting was categorized as possibly being a UFO, balloon, or aircraft,Venus was mentioned as a possible astronomical body observed at the same time,The object was described as red on both ends and bright in the center,The witness used binoculars to observe the object.
